text: This is the worst food I ever had. The chicken was burnt and greased. One pickle and a butt biscuit. Its like they scraped the leftovers and gave it as free food.

I will never order from here again. I live less than a mile away, it took over an hour and a half to get to me. I call twice to see where my order was and was hung up on both times. By the time the food arrived, it was cold and gross. I will never order from here and would suggest you stay away.

Pathetic. Frozen GFS product. Nothing fresh about anything. Giant eagle buns. Food is not at all like pictured. Not only did I pay $30 for this nonsense I had to sit and watch them make it for 40 mins after I phoned my order in for pickup.
